definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: An arrow would be useless without a bow and an archer.
sentences.chinese: 沒有弓和弓箭手，一支箭是不會有用的。

sentences.english: The survivors of the bowmen, the warriors of Kedar, will be few.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭手所餘剩的，就是基達人的勇士，必然稀少。

sentences.english: The archers drew all at once.
The earth was saved when a strong archer, Hou Yi, succeeded in shooting down 9 of the suns.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭手後翌射下了9個太陽，拯救了地球上的生靈。

sentences.english: We would not recognize the do-gooding, thigh-slapping, quick-trading gentleman-archer we know from fiction.
sentences.chinese: 小說中我們不會看到那個行善的弓箭手。

sentences.english: God was with the boy as he grew up. He lived in the desert and became an archer.
sentences.chinese: 上帝保佑童子，他就漸長，住在曠野，成了弓箭手。

sentences.english: Archers can be as nervous in battle as arquebusiers.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭手在戰鬥中一樣會緊張。

sentences.english: The archers drew their bows all at once.
In lower point games, the Kobold Archer shines even brighter.
sentences.chinese: 在較低分的遊戲中，狗頭人弓箭手會變得比較活躍。

sentences.english: They were highly disciplined and masters with using the bow and arrow on horseback.
sentences.chinese: 他們具有高度紀律性，是馬背上技藝高超的弓箭手。

sentences.english: They are skilled wielders of the eastern style composite bow.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林弓箭手對東方式複合弓使用嫺熟。

sentences.english: The Emperor ordered a famous archer to shoot down the nine extra suns.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝命令一個著名的弓箭手射下九個多餘的太陽。

sentences.english: Writing opensource code is giving back. It's much more than charity.
sentences.chinese: 編輯器對程序員而言，就是像是弓對弓箭手一樣重要。

sentences.english: (…) The archer ceases to be conscious of himself as the one who is engaged in hitting the bull’s-eye which confronts him.
sentences.chinese: 弓箭手不再將自己有意識的看成從事射靶的人。

sentences.english: Alex: Today's armies are weaponed with guns. Your bowmen are out of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 現在的軍隊都是用槍武裝的，您的弓箭手落伍了。

sentences.english: And God was with the lad; and he grew, and dwelt in the wilderness, and became an archer.
sentences.chinese: 神保佑童子，他就漸長，住在曠野，成了弓箭手。
